description: Chilly fall temps have finally met their stylish, street-friendly match with our new Men's Rye Jacket. Quick-drying, wind-blocking recycled polyester provides breathable comfort from cool, gusty days to mercury dropping nights. Snap this shirt jacket all the way up for extra warmth or rock it unbuttoned over a tee or flannel for casual style points whether you're out on the town, collecting kindling for a post-hike campfire, or braving the early-morning chill on your daily bike commute.
name: Marmot Rye Jacket - Mens
